quote: Never, ever, ever, ever, ever leave an appointment without the next appointment set.
why_clipworthy: It's a simple, actionable tactic that can immediately improve follow-up processes.
suggested_hook: Are you missing out on potential sales? Here's a simple tactic to ensure consistent follow-ups.

quote: Communication is the response you get.
why_clipworthy: This shifts the responsibility of communication outcomes to the agent, encouraging proactive improvement.
suggested_hook: Want to improve your communication skills? Start by understanding this key principle.
